questions.question: What is the Third National Development Strategy (NDS3)?
questions.expected_answer: Strategy to build diversified, knowledge-based, private sector-led economy

questions.expected_answer: Promote savings, develop insurance, foster fintech, achieve financial inclusion

questions.question: What is Qatar's medium-term GDP growth projection?

questions.expected_answer: Enhance human capital, innovation, business efficiency, attract FDI, trade diversification
